original_title: Dimmu Borgir: The Invaluable Darkness Tour
overview: The Invaluable Darkness is a live DVD by symphonic black metal band Dimmu Borgir. It was released on October 14, 2008. It is also the eighth song, not counting bonus tracks, on In Sorte Diaboli, their eighth studio album.
title: Dimmu Borgir: The Invaluable Darkness Tour
